sentence.Network_en: Slimming snacks that offer miraculous weight loss are a con.
sentence.Network_cn: 有神奇减肥效果的瘦身点心是一个骗局。

sentence.Network_en: The story ascends from a gothic tragedy to a miraculous fairy-tale.
sentence.Network_cn: 故事从一个哥特式悲剧升华为神奇的童话。

sentence.Network_en: This figure has long been held to possess miraculous power.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个数字长时间以来都被认为拥有神奇的力量。

inconvenience n. 不方便miraculously adv. 神奇地；奇迹般地caution n. 小心，谨慎

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French miraculeux or medieval Latin miraculosus, from Latin miraculum (see miracle)

entry.tran: 神奇的;奇迹般的;不可思议的
entry.def: If you describe a good event as miraculous, you mean that it is very surprising and unexpected.

example.ex: The horse made a miraculous recovery to finish a close third.
example.tran: 这匹马奇迹般地恢复了状态，以微弱的劣势位居第三。

entry.def: If someone describes a wonderful event as miraculous, they believe that the event was caused by God.

means.word_mean: 1. being or having the character of a miracle
2. peculiarly fortunate or appropriate; as if by divine intervention;

auth_sentence.content: What he has done is nothing short of miraculous.
auth_sentence.res_content: What he has done is nothing short of miraculous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What he has done is nothing short of miraculous.

auth_sentence.content: But then here comes the miraculous derivation of Crnjac.
auth_sentence.res_content: But then here comes the miraculous derivation of Crnjac.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But then here comes the miraculous derivation of Crnjac.

auth_sentence.content: Life seems miraculous if you believe the rock data.
auth_sentence.res_content: Life seems miraculous if you believe the rock data.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life seems miraculous if you believe the rock data.

means.word_mean: 奇迹般的, 超自然的

sentences.en: They won a miraculous victory over much stronger enemy.
sentences.cn: 他们战胜了远比自己强大的敌人, 赢得了非凡的胜利。

jushi.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
jushi.chinese: 这种新的疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

jushi.english: The relics are credited with miraculous powers.
jushi.chinese: 这些遗骸被认为具有神奇的力量。

jushi.english: He had a miraculous escape when a bullet from the enemy's guns grazed his head.
jushi.chinese: 敌人的枪弹擦伤了他的头皮,他奇迹般地幸免一死。
